## someNeighboringCoordinate() function

Determine if there is some coordinate neighboring the given coordinate for which the given predicate holds true.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function someNeighboringCoordinate(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate, iteratee: NeighborFn): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The coordinate whose neighbors will be tested.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

iteratee


</td><td>

[NeighborFn](./hive-lib.neighborfn.md)


</td><td>

The predicate function called for neighbors.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the predicate evaluates to true for any neighbor, false otherwise.
